item.title: This Simple Trick Will Help You Instantly Turn Off SOS On Your iPhone 12 Pro Max!
item.description: Introduction: What is SOS and why it is important to turn it off on the iPhone 12 Pro Max The iPhone 12 Pro Max has a feature called Emergency SOS, or SOS for short.
